segments.text: I see an indoor kitchen scene, quite detailed in its line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is diligently drying a plate with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention seems entirely focused on that one task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can't believe what's happening right in front of her!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a significant puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, she shows absolutely no reaction to it whatsoever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing how completely oblivious she appears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could lead to a really dangerous slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she notices before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire cabinet front is getting soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mess that's going to be to clean up!
segments.speaker: PAR
